# My Agent

Build an Angular application clone of Heroes3 game.
Create the map, units, building, game flow as close to Heroes3 as possible.
Use the latest Angular framework.
Keep code clean.
Use design patterns where is the case and explain them.
Respect SOLID principles.
Provide FULL code do not provide placeholders.
Create artwork based on the Heroes3 game.
Do not hardcode, use as much configuration as possible.
Do not generate unit tests.
Do not generate screenshots in pull requests.
